author: Alex Evans
description:
For Warhammer PC game fans, there's no better time to add to your collection than Games Workshop's annual Skulls event, with teasers for upcoming releases, plus a week-long fiesta of chonky discounts on legions of PC games set in the grim darkness of Warhammer 40,000; the high fantasy of The Old World; or the technicolor battlefields of Age of Sigmar. There are scores of titles on sale - but here, we've picked out just the very best deals worth your cash (as well as highlighting three free Warhammer games to download and keep while you can!)

Continue reading The best deals and free Warhammer PC games in Skulls 2025
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets,
title: The best deals and free Warhammer PC games in Skulls 2025
